name: Horticultist
description:
Description

To-mah-to, to-may-to?

Tomathotep wants you to help him build a family! Talk to villagers and help them with their problems. If you can make them trust you, they may join your family! But don't forget to follow up with them even after they've joined the family.
Can you impress Tomathotep all the way to Day 13?

Controls

WASD/Arrow keys/middle mouse button - move camera

Mouse scroll - zoom out

Left mouse button - clicky clicky

Tomathotep's commandments

1. Sacrifice all possessions to Tomathotep.

2. Spread His word, and pray every day.

3. Nonbelievers are not people.

4. You may love none but Tomathotep.

5. Must eat one Tomato each day.

Submission for Dogpit - Cultivation Jam:

Horticultist is a silly little game about cultivating relationships with your cultimates which culminates in your cultifate in the hands of a cosmic mate. You get to discipline your cultists and sow habits that are pleasing to Tomathothep, while pruning yourself to be a blossoming leader...or not.

Everything you see (except the emojis) and hear was lovingly made from scratch just for this game jam!
